title: What are the relevance of philosophy to our career as a student? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to live a reflective life seeking understanding, the nature of your heart's desires and the nature of this world, then you will study philosophy. Even if if it is not in a school or under the guidance of a teacher, there are more than enough books and more than enough people who will help you, including the people who are sitting right next to you. All you need to do is ask the most simple question. That is the essence of philosophy, asking the most simple questions and testing the answer. Philo=love; Sophia=,wisdom. Don't make the mistake of believing that knowledge is wisdom knowledge is merely a part of the basis of wisdom. Perception is another. Emotional affect is another. Your moral and ethical guidelines are part of it. All you need to do is ask yourself why?
